description: Erection of single storey rear extension (5m in depth, maximum height of 3m and eaves height of 2.9m)
decision_conditions: There have been amendments to the nationally set planning application fee regulations. Regulation 14 of the regulations has been amended to introduce a fee of Â£96, payable for all Notifications of larger home extension applications.You have not paid the requisite fee and as such your application has been Refused.

The proposed extension would extend beyond a wall forming a side elevation of the original dwellinghouse, and would have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse, in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (j)(iii).

Please note that the way in that these images have been scanned, they do not accurately depict the scale for each drawing. Kindly scan them exactly to size (A4) individually, and ensure each drawing has a scale marked, and a relevamt scale bar (1:50 or 100 scale)
